snippet: Paralyzed by a two-inch snowfall last month, Atlanta dodged the first punch of a dangerous winter storm on Tuesday, but forecasters warned of a thick layer of ice that threatened to bring hundreds of thousands of power failures.
abstract: Atlanta dodges first punch of dangerous winter storm, after being paralyzed by two-inch snowfall month earlier; forecasters warn, however, that a thick layer of ice still threatens to bring hundreds of thousands of power failures.
lead_paragraph: Paralyzed by a two-inch snowfall last month, Atlanta dodged the first punch of a dangerous winter storm on Tuesday, but forecasters warned of a thick layer of ice that threatened to bring hundreds of thousands of power failures.

headline.main: Georgia: Atlanta Area on Storm Alert
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Atlanta Area on Storm Alert
